Reviews.Title: “good value for central rome”
Reviews.Author: Jan B
Reviews.Content: easy reach 38 bus termini bus stop 3 piazza fiume 402 balcony watch locals business visit rome blew bought roma pass 30 euros paid free entry colisseum forum cutting queues hopped buses trains booked vatican tour online vatican website advance value note st basillica wed morning 1030am pope 6 feet amazing totally unexpected highlight break

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel - Location OK”
Reviews.Author: MJVADC
Reviews.Content: nice hotel lovely – ours balcony spent evening wine cheese reflecting day staff friendly breakfast drawback location 5 minute walk borghese gallery cab bus required attractions rome

Reviews.Title: “A well placed Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Barbara K
Reviews.Content: arrived rome october 2011 hotel ideally situated near supermarket cellular shop bus stops metro sation kilometer walking distance galleria borghese five minute taxi ride termini stazione 15 minute taxi ride vatican lots little restaurants immediate hotel tidy own bathroom service double overlooked street sisters single overlooked gardens buildings door balcony proved useful evening snacks glass wine breakfast available reception staff helpful help ensure visit galleria borghese booked tiniest elevator taking people time youre claustrophobic ok close eyes stairs able factor smell sewerage outside especially 3rd floor fortunately cost 2 people 4 nights october 2011 cost 600 euros reasonable extra levy day paid cost hotel sign lift informing additional cost

Reviews.Title: “awful”
Reviews.Author: PNINA_P
Reviews.Content: short stay rome executive low cost option hotel supposed 4 stars barely 2 staff polite friendly 404 horrible empty snaks beds none cleans beds stains curtains carpet dark light mirrors simple decoration poor curtain shower bathroom swimming pool breakfast basic location 15 mins walk via veneto shops restaurants nearby free wifi lobby

Reviews.Title: “thank u terry.problem with the beard guy”
Reviews.Author: Michael K
Reviews.Content: thanks reception terry wery helpfull nice makes hotel average beard reception guy realy dont remember name nervous angry time dont job anyway nice clean hotel

Reviews.Title: “NOT 4 star”

Reviews.Content: shower fixture broken shower head held floor drain exposed wires hanging wall decor cheap condition faced street noisy mirror lobby bathroom smashed lighting stairway lifts unreliable concierge passports duration stay keys everytime left hotel stayed nicer hostels

Reviews.Title: “Strange 4 stars???”

Reviews.Content: hotel according european standards isnt 2 star hotel 4 stars 4 star hotel decades ago apart shabby tiny poorly furnished equipped bathrooms carpets sofas dont clean breakfast poor staff friendly 4 star hotel hotel classified 4 stars mislead guests cash guests hotel shared views photos prove lifts unseen arent facilities handicapped people european regulations norms acceptable worth charged

Reviews.Title: “On checking out they were right not to ask "How was your stay?"”

Reviews.Content: hotel looked pleasant outside checked lift ive seen disappointed didnt care size disrepair fit guests bed clean stains walls carpets air vents hanging ceiling shower tray cracked water seeping floor onto carpet beside bed square plaster wall attempt cover television bed clothes changed 4 night stay toiletries werent replenished night honestly seen hotel advise thinking stay stay imagine answer dont

Reviews.Content: husband booked hotel suggested via trailfinders concerns reading reviews site expecting worst pleasantly surprised stay agree namely lift claustraphobic travelled 7 month baby struggled buggy bathroom benefit shower curtain tvs updated size bathroom clean bed comfortable continental breakfast plenty choice cold meat cheese eggs cereals breads yogurts fruit staff helpful pleasant terms location hotel isnt hub found immediate nice fantastic restaurants walk main attractions sights hotel supplied map actually instead aa purchased detail decided walk perfect beautiful sights alternatively metro easy taxis overly expensive wonderful time rome staying hotel executive

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected.”
